# Ignore .git
.git

# Ignore Drupal's file directory
web/sites/*/files
web/sites/*/private

# this should not even be in git, but we keep it here just to be sure:

# Ignore Drupal's local settings file
web/sites/*/local.services.yml

# Ignore files generated by PhpStorm
.idea

# Ignore dev modules
web/modules/dev

# Ignore all ._ files that osx creates
._*

# Ignore node_modules
node_modules

# Ignore css maps
web/themes/custom/*/css/*.css.map
web/themes/custom/*/css/admin/*.css.map

# Ignore auth json.
auth.json

# Ignore lokal.host docker setup
docker
